content.text:
Look at the following description corresponding the the relavant image(s), Then answer a question

***Start of description***

The image shows three different waves labeled (A), (B), and (C). Each wave represents an electromagnetic wave. Wave (A) has the largest peaks and troughs, indicating the highest amplitude. Wave (B) has smaller peaks and troughs than wave (A) but larger than wave (C). Wave (C) has the smallest peaks and troughs, indicating the lowest amplitude.

***End of description***
Now, answer the question:

Use the drawings to answer the question. Each drawing represents an electromagnetic wave. <image 1>,Which wave has the highest amplitude? 

A. a
B. b
C. c
Based on the description provided, wave (A) has the largest peaks and troughs, indicating the highest amplitude. Therefore, the answer is A. a
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
